  3. Isak 'N' Jiyeon

Lina

Isak

Introduction

Isak 'N' Jiyeon (Korean: 이삭 앤 지연) was a female duo under SM Entertainment. They made their solo debut on September 3, 2002 with the studio album Tell Me Baby. They supposedly disbanded in 2004, after Isak decided to move back to the States for her studies, whilst Jiyeon (now known as Lina) later joined CSJH The Grace in 2005.
